verses.verse: וַיְהִ֣י <WH1961> came אַֽחֲרֵי־ <WH310> And it came to pass after this כֵ֗ן <WH3651> after that וַיִּשְׁאַל֩ <WH7592> enquired דָּוִ֨ד <WH1732> that David בַּֽיהוָ֤ה ׀ <WH3068> of the LORD לֵאמֹר֙ <WH559> saying הַאֶעֱלֶ֗ה <WH5927> Shall I go up בְּאַחַת֙ <WH259> into any עָרֵ֣י <WH5892> of the cities יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> Judah וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֵלָ֖יו <WH413> to him עֲלֵ֑ה <WH5927> unto him Go up וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <WH559> said דָּוִ֛ד <WH1732> And David אָ֥נָה <WH575> Where אֶעֱלֶ֖ה <WH5927> Whither shall I go up וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> ? And he said חֶבְרֹֽנָה׃ <WH2275> Unto Hebron

וַיַּ֤עַל <WH5927> went up שָׁם֙ <WH8033> there דָּוִ֔ד <WH1732> So David וְגַ֖ם <WH1571> also שְׁתֵּ֣י <WH8147> thither and his two נָשָׁ֑יו <WH802> wives אֲחִינֹ֙עַם֙ <WH293> also Ahinoam הַיִּזְרְעֵלִ֔ית <WH3159> the Jezreelitess וַאֲבִיגַ֕יִל <WH26> and Abigail אֵ֖שֶׁת <WH802> wife נָבָ֥ל <WH5037> Nabal's הַֽכַּרְמְלִֽי׃ <WH3761> the Carmelite

וַאֲנָשָׁ֧יו <WH376> every man אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who עִמּ֛וֹ <WH5973> with הֶעֱלָ֥ה <WH5927> bring up דָוִ֖ד <WH1732> that [were] with him did David אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> each וּבֵית֑וֹ <WH1004> with his household וַיֵּשְׁב֖וּ <WH3427> and they dwelt בְּעָרֵ֥י <WH5892> in the cities חֶבְרֽוֹן׃ <WH2275> of Hebron

וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <WH935> came אַנְשֵׁ֣י <WH376> the men יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah וַיִּמְשְׁחוּ־ <WH4886> and there they anointed שָׁ֧ם <WH8033> and there אֶת־ <WH853> דָּוִ֛ד <WH1732> David לְמֶ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> king עַל־ <WH5921> over בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> over the house יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> of Judah וַיַּגִּ֤דוּ <WH5046> And they told לְדָוִד֙ <WH1732> David לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying אַנְשֵׁי֙ <WH376> it was the men יָבֵ֣ישׁ <WH3003> Jobesh גִּלְעָ֔ד <WH1568> Gilead אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who קָבְר֖וּ <WH6912> [were they] that buried אֶת־ <WH853> שָׁאֽוּל׃ <WH7586> Saul ס

וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <WH7971> sent דָּוִד֙ <WH1732> And David מַלְאָכִ֔ים <WH4397> messengers אֶל־ <WH413> to אַנְשֵׁ֖י <WH376> the men יָבֵ֣ישׁ <WH3003> Jobesh גִּלְעָ֑ד <WH1568> Gilead וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and said אֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <WH413> to בְּרֻכִ֤ים <WH1288> unto them Blessed אַתֶּם֙ <WH859> you לַֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> [be] ye of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> because עֲשִׂיתֶ֜ם <WH6213> that ye have shewed הַחֶ֣סֶד <WH2617> this kindness הַזֶּ֗ה <WH2088> this עִם־ <WH5973> with אֲדֹֽנֵיכֶם֙ <WH113> unto your lord עִם־ <WH5973> with שָׁא֔וּל <WH7586> [even] unto Saul וַֽתִּקְבְּר֖וּ <WH6912> and have buried אֹתֽוֹ׃ <WH853>

וְעַתָּ֕ה <WH6258> Now יַֽעַשׂ־ <WH6213> shew יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> And now the LORD עִמָּכֶ֖ם <WH5973> with חֶ֣סֶד <WH2617> kindness וֶאֱמֶ֑ת <WH571> and truth וְגַ֣ם <WH1571> also אָנֹכִ֗י <WH595> I אֶעֱשֶׂ֤ה <WH6213> unto you and I also will requite אִתְּכֶם֙ <WH854> for הַטּוֹבָ֣ה <WH2896> you this kindness הַזֹּ֔את <WH2063> to you אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> because עֲשִׂיתֶ֖ם <WH6213> because ye have done הַדָּבָ֥ר <WH1697> this thing הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this

וְעַתָּ֣ה ׀ <WH6258> Now תֶּחֱזַ֣קְנָה <WH2388> be strengthened יְדֵיכֶ֗ם <WH3027> Therefore now let your hands וִֽהְיוּ֙ <WH1961> become לִבְנֵי־ <WH1121> afflicted חַ֔יִל <WH2428> able כִּי־ <WH3588> for מֵ֖ת <WH4191> is dead אֲדֹנֵיכֶ֣ם <WH113> for your master שָׁא֑וּל <WH7586> Saul וְגַם־ <WH1571> and also אֹתִ֗י <WH853> מָשְׁח֧וּ <WH4886> have anointed בֵית־ <WH1004> and also the house יְהוּדָ֛ה <WH3063> of Judah לְמֶ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> me king עֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH5921> over פ

וְאַבְנֵ֣ר <WH74> But Abner בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son נֵ֔ר <WH5369> of Ner שַׂר־ <WH8269> captain צָבָ֖א <WH6635> host אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> his לְשָׁא֑וּל <WH7586> of Saul's לָקַ֗ח <WH3947> took אֶת־ <WH853> אִ֥ישׁ בֹּ֙שֶׁת֙ <WH378> Ishbosheth בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son שָׁא֔וּל <WH7586> of Saul וַיַּעֲבִרֵ֖הוּ <WH5674> and brought him over מַחֲנָֽיִם׃ <WH4266> to Mahanaim

וַיַּמְלִכֵ֙הוּ֙ <WH4427> And made him king אֶל־ <WH413> over הַגִּלְעָ֔ד <WH1568> over Gilead וְאֶל־ <WH413> over הָאֲשׁוּרִ֖י <WH805> and over the Ashurites וְאֶֽל־ <WH413> over יִזְרְעֶ֑אל <WH3157> and over Jezreel וְעַל־ <WH5921> over אֶפְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH669> and over Ephraim וְעַל־ <WH5921> and over בִּנְיָמִ֔ן <WH1144> and over Benjamin וְעַל־ <WH5921> over יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> and over all Israel כֻּלֹּֽה׃ <WH3605> all פ

בֶּן־ <WH1121> son אַרְבָּעִ֨ים <WH705> [was] forty שָׁנָ֜ה <WH8141> years אִֽישׁ־ בֹּ֣שֶׁת <WH378> Ishbosheth בֶּן־ <WH1121> old שָׁא֗וּל <WH7586> Saul's בְּמָלְכוֹ֙ <WH4427> when he began to reign עַל־ <WH5921> over יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> over Israel וּשְׁתַּ֥יִם <WH8147> two שָׁנִ֖ים <WH8141> years מָלָ֑ךְ <WH4427> and reigned אַ֚ךְ <WH389> however בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> But the house יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah הָי֖וּ <WH1961> become אַחֲרֵ֥י <WH310> followed דָוִֽד׃ <WH1732> David

וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> become מִסְפַּ֣ר <WH4557> abundance הַיָּמִ֔ים <WH3117> age אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> after הָיָ֨ה <WH1961> become דָוִ֥ד <WH1732> that David מֶ֛לֶךְ <WH4428> was king בְּחֶבְר֖וֹן <WH2275> in Hebron עַל־ <WH5921> over בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> over the house יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> of Judah שֶׁ֥בַע <WH7651> was seven שָׁנִ֖ים <WH8141> years וְשִׁשָּׁ֥ה <WH8337> and six חֳדָשִֽׁים׃ <WH2320> months ס

וַיֵּצֵא֙ <WH3318> went out אַבְנֵ֣ר <WH74> And Abner בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son נֵ֔ר <WH5369> of Ner וְעַבְדֵ֖י <WH5650> and the servants אִֽישׁ־ בֹּ֣שֶׁת <WH378> of Ishbosheth בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son שָׁא֑וּל <WH7586> of Saul מִֽמַּחֲנַ֖יִם <WH4266> from Mahanaim גִּבְעֽוֹנָה׃ <WH1391> to Gibeon

וְיוֹאָ֨ב <WH3097> And Joab בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son צְרוּיָ֜ה <WH6870> of Zeruiah וְעַבְדֵ֤י <WH5650> and the servants דָוִד֙ <WH1732> of David יָֽצְא֔וּ <WH3318> went out וַֽיִּפְגְּשׁ֛וּם <WH6298> and met עַל־ <WH5921> by בְּרֵכַ֥ת <WH1295> by the pool גִּבְע֖וֹן <WH1391> of Gibeon יַחְדָּ֑ו <WH3162> together וַיֵּ֨שְׁב֜וּ <WH3427> and they sat down אֵ֤לֶּה <WH428> one עַל־ <WH5921> of הַבְּרֵכָה֙ <WH1295> the one on the one side of the pool מִזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> the one וְאֵ֥לֶּה <WH428> one עַל־ <WH5921> of הַבְּרֵכָ֖ה <WH1295> and the other on the other side of the pool מִזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> side

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said אַבְנֵר֙ <WH74> And Abner אֶל־ <WH413> to יוֹאָ֔ב <WH3097> to Joab יָק֤וּמוּ <WH6965> now arise נָא֙ <WH4994> Now הַנְּעָרִ֔ים <WH5288> Let the young men וִֽישַׂחֲק֖וּ <WH7832> and play לְפָנֵ֑ינוּ <WH6440> before וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said יוֹאָ֖ב <WH3097> us And Joab יָקֻֽמוּ׃ <WH6965> Let them arise

וַיָּקֻ֖מוּ <WH6965> Then there arose וַיַּעַבְר֣וּ <WH5674> and went over בְמִסְפָּ֑ר <WH4557> by number שְׁנֵ֧ים <WH8147> both עָשָׂ֣ר <WH6240> ten לְבִנְיָמִ֗ן <WH1144> of Benjamin וּלְאִ֥ישׁ בֹּ֙שֶׁת֙ <WH378> which [pertained] to Ishbosheth בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son שָׁא֔וּל <WH7586> of Saul וּשְׁנֵ֥ים <WH8147> both עָשָׂ֖ר <WH6240> ten מֵעַבְדֵ֥י <WH5650> of the servants דָוִֽד׃ <WH1732> of David

וַֽיַּחֲזִ֜קוּ <WH2388> And they caught אִ֣ישׁ ׀ <WH376> every one בְּרֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> by the head רֵעֵ֗הוּ <WH7453> his fellow וְחַרְבּוֹ֙ <WH2719> and [thrust] his sword בְּצַ֣ד <WH6654> side רֵעֵ֔הוּ <WH7453> in his fellow's וַֽיִּפְּל֖וּ <WH5307> so they fell down יַחְדָּ֑ו <WH3162> together וַיִּקְרָא֙ <WH7121> was called לַמָּק֣וֹם <WH4725> wherefore that place הַה֔וּא <WH1931> he חֶלְקַ֥ת הַצֻּרִ֖ים <WH2521> Helkathhazzurim אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which בְּגִבְעֽוֹן׃ <WH1391> which [is] in Gibeon

וַתְּהִ֧י <WH1961> become הַמִּלְחָמָ֛ה <WH4421> battle קָשָׁ֥ה <WH7186> sore עַד־ <WH5704> against מְאֹ֖ד <WH3966> And there was a very בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> that day הַה֑וּא <WH1931> he וַיִּנָּ֤גֶף <WH5062> was beaten אַבְנֵר֙ <WH74> and Abner וְאַנְשֵׁ֣י <WH376> and the men יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> before עַבְדֵ֥י <WH5650> the servants דָוִֽד׃ <WH1732> of David

וַיִּֽהְיוּ־ <WH1961> become שָׁ֗ם <WH8033> were there שְׁלֹשָׁה֙ <WH7969> And there were three בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> sons צְרוּיָ֔ה <WH6870> of Zeruiah יוֹאָ֥ב <WH3097> there Joab וַאֲבִישַׁ֖י <WH52> and Abishai וַעֲשָׂהאֵ֑ל <WH6214> and Asahel וַעֲשָׂהאֵל֙ <WH6214> and Asahel קַ֣ל <WH7031> [was as] light בְּרַגְלָ֔יו <WH7272> of foot כְּאַחַ֥ד <WH259> as a הַצְּבָיִ֖ם <WH6643> roe אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which בַּשָּׂדֶֽה׃ <WH7704> wild

וַיִּרְדֹּ֥ף <WH7291> pursued עֲשָׂהאֵ֖ל <WH6214> And Asahel אַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> after אַבְנֵ֑ר <WH74> Abner וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> and did not נָטָ֣ה <WH5186> he turned לָלֶ֗כֶת <WH1980> along עַל־ <WH5921> unto הַיָּמִין֙ <WH3225> not to the right hand וְעַֽל־ <WH5921> or הַשְּׂמֹ֔אול <WH8040> nor to the left מֵאַחֲרֵ֖י <WH310> from following אַבְנֵֽר׃ <WH74> Abner

וַיִּ֤פֶן <WH6437> looked אַבְנֵר֙ <WH74> Then Abner אַֽחֲרָ֔יו <WH310> behind וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> him and said הַאַתָּ֥ה <WH859> you זֶ֖ה <WH2088> he עֲשָׂהאֵ֑ל <WH6214> Asahel וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> and said אָנֹֽכִי׃ <WH595> I

וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <WH559> said ל֣וֹ אַבְנֵ֗ר <WH74> And Abner נְטֵ֤ה <WH5186> to him Turn thee aside לְךָ֙ עַל־ <WH5921> unto יְמִֽינְךָ֙ <WH3225> to thy right hand א֣וֹ <WH176> or עַל־ <WH5921> unto שְׂמֹאלֶ֔ךָ <WH8040> or to thy left וֶאֱחֹ֣ז <WH270> and lay thee hold לְךָ֗ אֶחָד֙ <WH259> on one מֵֽהַנְּעָרִ֔ים <WH5288> of the young men וְקַח־ <WH3947> and take לְךָ֖ אֶת־ <WH853> חֲלִצָת֑וֹ <WH2488> thee his armour וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> was not אָבָ֣ה <WH14> would עֲשָׂהאֵ֔ל <WH6214> But Asahel לָס֖וּר <WH5493> not turn aside מֵאַחֲרָֽיו׃ <WH310> from following

וַיֹּ֧סֶף <WH3254> again ע֣וֹד <WH5750> again אַבְנֵ֗ר <WH74> And Abner לֵאמֹר֙ <WH559> said אֶל־ <WH413> to עֲשָׂהאֵ֔ל <WH6214> to Asahel ס֥וּר <WH5493> Turn thee aside לְךָ֖ מֵאַֽחֲרָ֑י <WH310> from following לָ֤מָּה <WH4100> Why אַכֶּ֙כָּה֙ <WH5221> me wherefore should I smite אַ֔רְצָה <WH776> common וְאֵיךְ֙ <WH349> how אֶשָּׂ֣א <WH5375> lift פָנַ֔י <WH6440> my face אֶל־ <WH413> to יוֹאָ֖ב <WH3097> to Joab אָחִֽיךָ׃ <WH251> to your brother

וַיְמָאֵ֣ן <WH3985> Howbeit he refused לָס֗וּר <WH5493> to turn aside וַיַּכֵּ֣הוּ <WH5221> smote אַבְנֵר֩ <WH74> wherefore Abner בְּאַחֲרֵ֨י <WH310> with the hinder end הַחֲנִ֜ית <WH2595> of the spear אֶל־ <WH413> him under הַחֹ֗מֶשׁ <WH2570> the fifth וַתֵּצֵ֤א <WH3318> came out הַֽחֲנִית֙ <WH2595> [rib] that the spear מֵאַחֲרָ֔יו <WH310> behind וַיִּפָּל־ <WH5307> him and he fell down שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> there וַיָּ֣מָת <WH4191> there and died [תַּחַתֹו כ] (תַּחְתָּ֑יו <WH8478> Thahash ק) וַיְהִ֡י <WH1961> came כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַבָּ֣א <WH935> and it came to pass [that] as many as came אֶֽל־ <WH413> to הַמָּקוֹם֩ <WH4725> to the place אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after נָ֨פַל <WH5307> fell down שָׁ֧ם <WH8033> there עֲשָׂהאֵ֛ל <WH6214> where Asahel וַיָּמֹ֖ת <WH4191> and died וַֽיַּעֲמֹֽדוּ׃ <WH5975> stood still

וַֽיִּרְדְּפ֛וּ <WH7291> pursued יוֹאָ֥ב <WH3097> Joab וַאֲבִישַׁ֖י <WH52> also and Abishai אַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> after אַבְנֵ֑ר <WH74> Abner וְהַשֶּׁ֣מֶשׁ <WH8121> and the sun בָּ֔אָה <WH935> went down וְהֵ֗מָּה <WH1992> they בָּ֚אוּ <WH935> when they were come עַד־ <WH5704> against גִּבְעַ֣ת <WH1389> to the hill אַמָּ֔ה <WH522> of Ammah אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> which עַל־ <WH5921> is in פְּנֵי־ <WH6440> that [lieth] before גִ֔יחַ <WH1520> Giah דֶּ֖רֶךְ <WH1870> by the way מִדְבַּ֥ר <WH4057> of the wilderness גִּבְעֽוֹן׃ <WH1391> of Gibeon

וַיִּֽתְקַבְּצ֤וּ <WH6908> gathered themselves together בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> And the children בִנְיָמִן֙ <WH1144> of Benjamin אַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> after אַבְנֵ֔ר <WH74> Abner וַיִּהְי֖וּ <WH1961> and became לַאֲגֻדָּ֣ה <WH92> troop אֶחָ֑ת <WH259> and became one וַיַּ֣עַמְד֔וּ <WH5975> and stood עַ֥ל <WH5921> on רֹאשׁ־ <WH7218> on the top גִּבְעָ֖ה <WH1389> of an hill אֶחָֽת׃ <WH259> of a certain

וַיִּקְרָ֨א <WH7121> called אַבְנֵ֜ר <WH74> Then Abner אֶל־ <WH413> to יוֹאָ֗ב <WH3097> to Joab וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> and said הֲלָנֶ֙צַח֙ <WH5331> alway תֹּ֣אכַל <WH398> devour חֶ֔רֶב <WH2719> Shall the sword הֲל֣וֹא <WH3808> refrain יָדַ֔עְתָּה <WH3045> acknowledge כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that it מָרָ֥ה <WH4751> thou not that it will be bitterness תִהְיֶ֖ה <WH1961> become בָּאַחֲרוֹנָ֑ה <WH314> after וְעַד־ <WH5704> against מָתַי֙ <WH4970> long לֹֽא־ <WH3808> refrain תֹאמַ֣ר <WH559> telling לָעָ֔ם <WH5971> the people לָשׁ֖וּב <WH7725> return מֵאַחֲרֵ֥י <WH310> from following אֲחֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH251> another

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said יוֹאָ֔ב <WH3097> And Joab חַ֚י <WH2416> liveth הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> [As] God כִּ֥י <WH3588> surely לוּלֵ֖א <WH3884> unless דִּבַּ֑רְתָּ <WH1696> thou hadst spoken כִּ֣י <WH3588> surely אָ֤ז <WH227> then מֵֽהַבֹּ֙קֶר֙ <WH1242> surely then in the morning נַעֲלָ֣ה <WH5927> had gone up הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> the people אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> every one מֵאַחֲרֵ֥י <WH310> from following אָחִֽיו׃ <WH251> his brother

וַיִּתְקַ֤ע <WH8628> blew יוֹאָב֙ <WH3097> So Joab בַּשּׁוֹפָ֔ר <WH7782> a trumpet וַיַּֽעַמְדוּ֙ <WH5975> stood still כָּל־ <WH3605> and all הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> and all the people וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> no יִרְדְּפ֥וּ <WH7291> and pursued ע֖וֹד <WH5750> longer אַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> after יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Israel וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor יָסְפ֥וּ <WH3254> they any more ע֖וֹד <WH5750> anymore לְהִלָּחֵֽם׃ <WH3898> no more neither fought

וְאַבְנֵ֣ר <WH74> And Abner וַֽאֲנָשָׁ֗יו <WH582> and his men הָֽלְכוּ֙ <WH1980> walked בָּֽעֲרָבָ֔ה <WH6160> through the plain כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> all הַלַּ֣יְלָה <WH3915> all that night הַה֑וּא <WH1931> they וַיַּעַבְר֣וּ <WH5674> and passed over אֶת־ <WH853> הַיַּרְדֵּ֗ן <WH3383> Jordan וַיֵּֽלְכוּ֙ <WH1980> walked כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַבִּתְר֔וֹן <WH1338> all Bithron וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <WH935> and they came מַחֲנָֽיִם׃ <WH4266> to Mahanaim

וְיוֹאָ֗ב <WH3097> And Joab שָׁ֚ב <WH7725> returned מֵאַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> from following אַבְנֵ֔ר <WH74> Abner וַיִּקְבֹּ֖ץ <WH6908> together אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָעָ֑ם <WH5971> all the people וַיִּפָּ֨קְד֜וּ <WH6485> there lacked מֵעַבְדֵ֥י <WH5650> servants דָוִ֛ד <WH1732> of David's תִּשְׁעָֽה־ <WH8672> nine עָשָׂ֥ר <WH6240> teen אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> men וַעֲשָׂה־ <WH6214> and Asahel אֵֽל׃ <WH410> God

וְעַבְדֵ֣י <WH5650> But the servants דָוִ֗ד <WH1732> of David הִכּוּ֙ <WH5221> had smitten מִבִּנְיָמִ֔ן <WH1144> of Benjamin וּבְאַנְשֵׁ֖י <WH376> men אַבְנֵ֑ר <WH74> and of Abner's שְׁלֹשׁ־ <WH7969> [so that] three מֵא֧וֹת <WH3967> hundred וְשִׁשִּׁ֛ים <WH8346> and threescore אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> men מֵֽתוּ׃ <WH4191> died

וַיִּשְׂאוּ֙ <WH5375> And they took up אֶת־ <WH853> עֲשָׂהאֵ֔ל <WH6214> Asahel וַֽיִּקְבְּרֻ֙הוּ֙ <WH6912> and buried בְּקֶ֣בֶר <WH6913> him in the sepulchre אָבִ֔יו <WH1> of his father אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which בֵּ֣ית לָ֑חֶם <WH1035> which [was in] Bethlehem וַיֵּלְכ֣וּ <WH1980> went כָל־ <WH3605> all הַלַּ֗יְלָה <WH3915> all night יוֹאָב֙ <WH3097> And Joab וַֽאֲנָשָׁ֔יו <WH376> and his men וַיֵּאֹ֥ר <WH215> at break of day לָהֶ֖ם בְּחֶבְרֽוֹן׃ <WH2275> and they came to Hebron
